BonusDescriptions.Full: Caseless Ammo can be equipped multiple times
Ammo Box grants buff to all MG's
Ammo Box grants buff to all AC2
Ammo Box grants buff to all AC5
Ammo Box grants buff to all AC10
Ammo Box grants buff to all AC20
Ammo Box grants buff to all Gauss Rifles
Ammo Box grants buff to all LRM
Ammo Box grants buff to all SRM
Can be used with Artemis IV System
Requires a ECM system to be installed
Requires Artemis IV System to be installed
This Weapon has reduced Damage at longer Ranges
Target Painter grant improved Hitchances against their Targets
Pulse Laser have +2 Accuracy and ignore 2 Evasion
Streak SRM have +2 Accuracy and ignore 2 Evasion
CASE prevents Ammo Explosion from travelling to Center Torso
CASE II reduces Ammo Explosion Damage to only three points of Damage.
Bulwark grants guarded when standing still
Breaching shot allows to ignore cover with a single Weapon per Target

{0} reduced Structure Weight from 1/10 Chassis weight

{0} Death from Above Self Damage taken

Description.Name: Engine Crit (1)
Description.Details: Engine was hit, additional 15 Heat / Turn

Description.Name: Engine Crit (2)
Description.Details: Engine was hit, additional 30 Heat / Turn
